channel.title: Crossbow Lag
channel.description:
Whenever I try and scope with the Crossbow, I get major lag spikes. This really doesn't help aim at all. Anything I can do to help with that?
A part of me is convinced this is the Developers trying to make the Crossbow less OP Its an absolute beast

item.title: Crossbow Lag
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
This happens every time I zoom in with the crossbow very annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: Crossbow Lag
item.dc:creator: Ronster
item.description:
yeah your absolutley right on this and nobody seems to know what is really causing the choppiness of movement when scoped.

I would just hope they can put an overlay of the scope to the zoomed suit as the zoomed suit does not suffer these issues… Somthing is definatley wrong here

Read full topic
